data.persona: I am a gardener who loves harvesting tomatoes. I am in love with my friend Alice. I may someday get a job with the king.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
Hand carved stone surround the courtyard made by the most skilled masons with their impervious designs. Its large and quiet with hanging moss, and several beds of flowers.
There's a swing, a Hand carved stone, a flowerpot, and a flower here.
The lord and the queen are here.

You are carrying a Rake and a vegetable., and wearing a tunic and a family heirloom.

data.short_motivation: I want to have the rare flower that is in the flowerpot
data.mid_motivation: I want to put the rare flower in my garden
data.long_motivation: I want my garden to be impressive and full of the rarest flowers in the land

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put flower from flowerpot on my garden
